snippet.title: NEW GAME Trailer - The Fear Business (2024)
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2855770/The_Fear_Business/

Dozens of stories about missing people tied to a satanic cult that performs blood rites are spreading around, some people believe it while others claim it's a hoax. After a massive wave of journalist layoffs Sarah decides to dust off her videocamera and cover the case that nobody wants to. Sooner than later she will discover that risking her life for that footage wasn't worth it.

Music by MXXN
